pageProduct.name: Allens Minties 150g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Allen's Minties are an old-time classic mint that leave you saying
"ahh" - not just because they're nostalgic, but because they're refreshing, chewy, and minty. Want a challenge? Tear along the edges of an open wrapper to make the longest Minties strip... we dare you!


• Allen's has been a little bit of fun since 1891.
• Recycle me! Return your soft plastic wrappers in store through REDcycle.
• Minties contain no artificial colours so are great for sharing with family and friends.
• 3 Minties = 1 Portion

Size: 150g

Serving Size: 20g

Ingredients

Ingredients:  Glucose Syrup (From Corn), Cane Sugar, Gelatine, Peppermint Oil, Vegetable Oils.      Made in New Zealand from Local and Imported Ingredients.       No Artificial Colours.        May Contain Egg.

Allergen May Be Present: Egg

Directions

Store Cool and Dry.
